H0.text: how many nfl games were played in london. 15

H1.text: how many nfl games were played in london. 32

H2.text: how many nfl games were played in london. 10

H3.text: how many nfl games were played in london. 21

A4.text: The NFL played three international games for the 2014 season, including one game with an earlier 9:30 am ET (2:30 pm UK time) start, which allowed for an afternoon game, rather than an evening game, in London.

A5.text: A single game was held in London each year through 2012.

A6.text: The NFL announced there were to be two NFL regular season games played at Wembley during the 2013 season.

A7.text: A new agreement was reached in 2022 which would see Jacksonville continue to host annual games for three years until 2024.
